sentences.en: Do not use emollients or oils to lubricate the skin.
sentences.cn: 不要用润肤剂或油类来润滑皮肤。

sentences.en: Do not use lotions or oils to lubricate the skin.
sentences.cn: 不要用润肤剂或油类来润滑皮肤.

sentences.en: If O - ring is to be replaced, lubricate as above.
sentences.cn: 如果更换O 形 环, 也要向上述那样润滑.

sentences.en: If you never bother to lubricate your engine, of course it will seize up.
sentences.cn: 你如果不愿给发动机上油, 那它当然就会停止转动的.

sentences.en: Lubricate adjuster screw threads and pivot with spray lube.
sentences.cn: 使用喷雾润滑油润滑调整器螺丝螺纹和枢轴.

sentences.en: Lubricate all moving parts with grease.
sentences.cn: 给所有活动部件加润滑油。

sentences.en: Lubricate O - ring with power steering fluid and install into the housing.
sentences.cn: 用动力转向油润滑O型环,并将其安装在外壳上.

sentences.en: Lubricate of main bearing is ensured by oil supply interlock system.
sentences.cn: 供油联锁系统对确保主轴的润滑起到了保障作用.

sentences.en: Mineral oils are used to lubricate machinery.
sentences.cn: 矿物油被用来润滑机器。

sentences.en: Semimetal Brake Materialsconsist of reinforcing fiber, friction element, lubricate element and polymer.
sentences.cn: 半金属制动材料是由增强纤维、增塑剂 、 摩擦组元 、 润滑组元和树脂组成的.

sentences.en: The four pillars are lubricated mechanically. Just press the button to lubricate.
sentences.cn: 四柱采用机械式加油, 只需按动按钮,便可加油.

sentences.en: The oil best calculated to lubricate the political machine was the loot that it received.
sentences.cn: 这部政治机器最好的润滑油,是它的非法收入.

sentences.en: Transmission oil is used to lubricate the components in a gearbox.
sentences.cn: 而变速器油则用来润滑变速器中的零部件.

sentences.en: Usage: lubricate cutter before starting work, lubricate it every one hour.
sentences.cn: 使用方法: 工作前润滑刀具,每个小时润滑一次.

sentences.en: You Shou 1 d lubricate the wheels of your bicycle once a month.
sentences.cn: 你每月应该给自行车轮上一次润滑油.

sentences.en: You should lubricate the wheels of your bicycle once a month.
sentences.cn: 你应该每个月给自行车轮子加一次润滑油.

words.tran_cn: 润滑器；润滑物；油壶；加油工
润滑能力；不稳定（性）；狡猾；难以捉摸
给…注润滑油；使…平滑；对…有帮助（lubricate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to put a lubricant on something in order to make it move more smoothly
to put a lubricant on something in order to make it move more smoothly
